about text: This project is a simple multilingual blog built to demonstrate modern web development practices using Next.js. It showcases how to handle routing, server-side rendering, and localization in a real-world context. The team behind this project focuses on clean code, accessibility, and building scalable UI components with a thoughtful user experience in mind.

meta about description: Learn more about the MiniBlog project, the technologies behind it, and the team that built it.
meta layout description: Read posts, explore routes, and learn Next.js features through a clean and accessible multilingual blog.
